qas.question: What kind of system is a solar chimney?
What is a solar chimney made of?

answers.text: a vertical shaft connecting the interior and exterior of a building

qas.question: How can the performance of a solar chimney be improved?

answers.text: by using glazing and thermal mass materials in a way that mimics greenhouses

context: A solar chimney (or thermal chimney, in this context) is <a1_0>a <a0_0>passive solar ventilation<a0_0/> system<a1_0/> composed of <a2_0>a vertical shaft connecting the interior and exterior of a building<a2_0/>. As the chimney warms, the air inside is heated causing an updraft that pulls air through the building. Performance can be improved <a3_0>by using glazing and thermal mass materials in a way that mimics greenhouses<a3_0/>.
